name: SmartRules.com
tag_list: local-rules, civil-procedure, court-rules, legal, law, litigation
overview:
SmartRules provides step-by-step instructions for local rules and civil procedure for courts nationwide.

The SmartRules blog also keeps civil litigation and bankruptcy professionals informed about:

  1. New and changing rules of civil procedure for civil litigation and bankruptcy practice. We post alerts and updates regarding local, statewide, federal and bankruptcy rules changes.

  2. “At A Glance Guides” for drafting, filing and serving civil litigation documents for state and federal United States jurisdictions.

  3. Topics of general interest to civil litigators such as discovery practice, especially electronic discovery, cost effective litigation practices, litigating in the electronic age, and other litigation news and trends.â€
